attributes.action: Enact provisions whereby military personnel on active duty (i.e.operational) are not required to pay Income Tax for the duration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To recognise the selfless committment and dedication of our Armed Services and reserve forces during operations, the law must be changed so that in any period that they are on operational duties, personnel are not required to pay income tax on their salary.
